# Case 1

69M h/o PAD, ESRD s/p LUE-AVF, MM, DM  
p/w left foot gangrene (recent amputation)  
c/s pre-op LHC for BKA  
DSE = severe apical hypokinesis

.pull-left[
### Access
Right radial, 5F
Terumo Tiger, 5F
JL-3, 5F

### Interventions
None
]

.pull-right[
### Outcomes
- LM bifurcation disease, Medina 1,1,1
- LAD and LCX 70% at ostia
- LM at 60% distal
]

Right Radial, 6F  
JR-4, 5F  
JL-3.5, F5  
XB 3.5 Guide, 5F  

### Interventions
IVUS  
Balloon 2.5 x 15 mm  
DES x 2 (3 x 38 mm, 4 x 38 mm)

- RCA mid to distal disease, 80% stenosis
- Jailing of RV marginal branch
]
